themes: support for venues renting to small groups
need for new venues in underserved areas
grant funding to subsidize rental costs
disappointment with The Long Center's accessibility
key_phrases: these are fast disappearing and it's a real crisis
Strongly support performance venues (specifically venues that host theater and dance) who rent their space to smaller groups
Help establish new venues in areas where there are none--in unused warehouses, that kind of thing
Support venues who will use grants to keep costs relatively low for those renters
The Long Center was such a disappointment
the Rollins space, which was supposed to be for the use of the local community, is priced far out of reach of most local groups
Affordable venues will make the performing arts thrive
barriers_identified: high rental costs at existing venues
lack of venues in certain areas
solutions_proposed: support venues that rent to smaller groups
establish new venues in unused warehouses or areas with none
provide grants to venues to keep rental costs low
